contentencoded:
From the Marketplace Datebook, here's a look at what's coming up Tuesday:

  • In Washington, a Senate Committee holds a hearing on "Examining Mental Health: Treatment Options and Trends."
  • The Conference Board releases its monthly Consumer Confidence Index.
  • And let's take a look at the cans in your pantry. Peaches? Green beans? Chocolate pudding? February is National Canned Food Month.
title: Celebrating the pantry staples
